content: 82 105 120 214 298 meters - 75 96 109 195 272 **cc2** - ***sueño worsted*** #1333 charcoal ***extra klasse*** #4508 - black hanks balls - 1 2 2 2 2 yards - 205 234 276 319 340 meters - 187 214 252 291 311 <big><big>gauge</big></big> 20 sts & 24 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette approx 5 x 6 sts per 1 2 5 cm after blocking <big><big>needles + notions</big></big> smaller needles us 7 4 5 mm 16 32 40 cm 80cm circular needles / dpns for sleeves larger needles - us 9 5 5 mm 32 80 cm circular needles / dpns for sleeves tapestry needle stitch markers scissors scrap yarn & crochet hook approx 4 5mm for tubular cast-on <big><big>playlist</big></big> want something to listen to while you knit i ve put together a special spotify playlist just for this sweater ** ♫ press play ♫ 7 ** <big><big>credits</big></big> tech edited by idlehandsknitsdht /people/idlehandsknitsdht > **i d love to see your sweater ** > > share on instagram 8 using the hashtag > #phdcandidatesweater 9 and tag me @dearingenue 2 > > need answers to your questions or want > to share your progress > > join my ravelry group dear ingénue > knits 10 for pattern support the > designer may be contacted at > dear ingenue knits@gmail com 11 1 https //www dearingenue com/links 2 https //instagram com/dearingenue 3 https //www rainforestcoalition org/donate/# ~ text=donation%20options %2c%20nonprofit%20 501c3 %20organization 4 https //earthjustice org/about 5 https //thesolutionsproject org/ 6 https //bit ly/joglessjogvideo 7 https //open spotify com/playlist/6pocj2elc8lfyr6duwcnnx si=831f765e095f4b81 8 mailto dear ingenue knits@gmail com 9 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/phdcandidatesweater/ 10 https //www ravelry com/groups/dear-ingenue-knits 11 mailto dear ingenue knits@gmail com
